article.title: Webber To Direct OPNAV Net-Centric Capabilities Division
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Office of the Chief of Naval Operations

article.text: Rear Adm. Diane E.H. Webber, USN, has been assigned director, Net-Centric Capabilities Division, N-2/N-6F1, Office of the Chief of Naval Operations, Washington, D.C
